text: Gerrit Smith may refer to: *Gerrit Smith (1797 — 1874), United States social reformer, abolitionist, politician, and philanthropist. **Gerrit Smith Estate, in Peterboro, New York, was a home of Gerrit Smith. *Gerrit Smith (rugby union), South African rugby union player. *Gerrit Smith Miller, Jr. (1869 – 1956), an American zoologist and botanist. ==See also== *Gerrit (disambiguation)
title: Gerrit Smith (disambiguation)
